title: Gym Chain Equinox Nets Financing to Ease Potential SPAC Deal
sub_head: Company has received commitments for $255 million from banks and investors affiliated with Related Cos.
body:
Equinox Group LLC has obtained $255 million in new financing commitments from some of its lenders and owners, as the cash-strapped gym chain seeks to bolster its liquidity, according to people familiar with the matter.
Lenders extending new financing include Bank of America Corp., Citigroup Inc., and Goldman Sachs Group Inc., these people said. Executives at property developer Related Cos. who own a stake in Equinox are also providing funds, according to the people familiar with the matter.
